metadata.title: Bering Sea Climate and Ecosystem

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: To provide ecological and climatic indices for the Bering Sea which will serve as measures of climate and ecosystem status for the Bering Sea. Those will be based on retrospective data, a protocol for detection of change.
metadata.notes:
